title: 상황 강조 - 긴급상황
description: 긴급하고 중요한 상황을 효과적으로 강조하는 원어민 수준의 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: We need to do it right now! There's no time!
This is really urgent. We can't put it off any longer.
The situation has become serious. Immediate action is needed.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 긴급상황 표현 구사

sentences.kr: 지금 당장 해야 해! 시간이 없어!
sentences.en: We need to do it right now! There's no time!

sentences.kr: 이거 진짜 급해. 더 미룰 수 없어.
sentences.en: This is really urgent. We can't put it off any longer.
The situation has become serious. Immediate action is needed.
This is the last chance. If we miss it, it's over.
This is the critical moment. We have to choose.

sentences.kr: 더 이상 기다릴 시간이 없어. 지금 아니면 안 돼.
sentences.en: There's no more time to wait. It's now or never.

sentences.kr: 사태가 걷잡을 수 없어졌어. 빨리 뭔가 해야 해.
sentences.en: Things have gotten out of hand. We need to do something quickly.
This is a really important moment. Let's decide carefully.
